Twisteric: Oh... there you were, butterfly-boy... how about we go and 
destroy some stuff? I feel like pumping shells and blowing things up. 
How bout you?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Guy with a Shovel" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: Here it is, my grand re-entrance.
> 
> BIC: Equinox walks up behind Twisteric. He seems to be built like a 
G1 (Generation 1) Transformer. Could he be a new age Insecticon? With 
those insect legs on his back, and all.
> 
> Equinox: Twisteric, goofing off on our job again, 'gain? And don't 
ask what our job is, either! If I like to say it, I should be able to, 
to!
> 
> He walks right up and actually puts a hand on Twisteric, leaning on 
him.
> 
> Equinox: Where has the excitement in life gone, Twisteric, eric, 
where are we in the mix? We need to do something to change the events 
of time, have any ideas, eas?
> 
> He knew it was far fetched, but he liked to give Twisteric a 
chance...
> 
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: warriorazure 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Tuesday, December 18, 2001 9:22 AM
>   Subject: Chaotic duo
> 
> 
>   Colony Omicron, 20 stellar cycles after the X carnage...
> 
>   The psychotic transformer stumbled for the fifth time in the last 
few 
>   minutes. He was drunk again, but he would never admit it. He was a 
>   failure... a total failure... a scrap bunch better off in a 
recycling 
>   plant...
> 
>   Twisteric: shird time... gawdangit... I shink geeze guys... are 
dumbs! 
>   Shree times! They said I am MENTALLY UNSHTABLE!
> 
>   He had pronounced this difficultly. He tripped over some piece of 
>   trash and fell down on all his length... Then he realized...
> 
>   Twisteric: HEY! WHERE THE PIT ARE YOU?
> 
>   He had been accompanied by a friend, but he had lost him 
somewhere... 
>   He looked in his chest compartment just in case...
> 
> 
>
